item.description:
Explore another area of Musquash with Beau and I! We've done this a few times now and it's great. Nice trails with hills, great views and some wetness but manageable... Plan on roughly a 1.5 - 2 hour hike.

We'll be meeting at Faucher Road, Londonderry... Park at the end of it where it's a loop before the trailhead entrance. Please bring poop bags and some may want bug spray.

http://londonderrytra...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet off the loop before entering the trail. We will leave promptly at 2:05.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Musquash White and Blue Trails
